descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Luka Doncic dances on Paul George, then splashes the step-back 3.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Luka hits tough step-back 3 over Paul George) 2021/05/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Luka hits tough step-back 3 over Paul George

videos.description: Luka Doncic drives down the lane and finishes the dunk over Marcus Morris.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Luka crams dunk on Morris) 2021/05/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Luka crams dunk on Morris

videos.description: Ivica Zubac swats Jalen Brunson's shot off the backboard leading to a Clippers fastbreak and a Kawhi Leonard 3.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Zubac's block leads to the Kawhi 3) 2021/05/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Zubac's block leads to the Kawhi 3

videos.description: Josh Richardson lobs it up to Willie Cauley-Stein who has to reach back completely behind his head and throw it down.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Cauley-Stein goes full extension on alley-oop) 2021/05/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Cauley-Stein goes full extension on alley-oop

videos.description: Kristaps Porzingis steps way behind the line and cans the 3-pointer.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Porzingis hits the 3 from just inside the logo) 2021/05/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Porzingis hits the 3 from just inside the logo

videos.description: Paul George goes at Kristaps Porzingiz and has him stumbling on his way to the dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (George sauces Porzingis, finishes with a slam) 2021/05/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: George sauces Porzingis, finishes with a slam

videos.description: Patrick Beverley rips the ball away from Luka Doncic, starting a fast break that ends in Reggie Jackson flushing home the dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Beverley steals it from Luka, finds Reggie Jackson for the jam) 2021/05/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Beverley picks Luka's pocket, sets up Clippers jam

videos.description: Kawhi Leonard steps into the 3-pointer and drains it, giving him 30 points at the half.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Kawhi gets to 30 at halftime with a 3) 2021/05/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Kawhi gets to 30 at halftime with a 3

videos.description: Luka Doncic extends Dallas' lead to 7 in the third quarter after bottoming the 3-pointer.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Luka's 3 forces a Clipper timeout) 2021/05/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Luka's 3 forces a Clipper timeout

videos.description: Luka Doncic backs down Kawhi Leonard and puts in the fadeaway over Kawhi's outstretched arms.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Luka goes at Kawhi, hits tough fadeaway 2021/05/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Luka goes at Kawhi, hits tough fadeaway

videos.description: Luka Doncic has no limits to his game as he hits the running 3-pointer off one foot.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Luka hits the 3-pointer ... off one foot) 2021/05/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Luka hits the 3-pointer ... off one foot

videos.description: Kristaps Porzingis' 3 hits the rim and bounces way up into the air and back into the hoop.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Porzingis gets quite the roll on the 3) 2021/05/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Porzingis gets quite the roll on the 3

videos.description: Paul George gets Tim Hardaway Jr. with the jab step, then finds Kawhi Leonard who splashes the 3.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (George has Hardaway stumbling, finds Kawhi for 3) 2021/05/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: George has Hardaway stumbling, finds Kawhi for 3

videos.description: Tim Hardaway Jr. splashes the 3-pointer icing the win as Dallas goes up 2-0 in the series.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Hardaway ices Mavs' Game 2 win) 2021/05/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Hardaway ices Mavs' Game 2 win

videos.description: Dirk Nowitzki celebrates from the crowd as the Mavericks take a 2-0 lead over the Clippers.
videos.headline: Dirk celebrates Mavs' win

videos.description: Luka Doncic continues his stellar postseason start by scoring 39 points and leading Dallas to a 2-0 series lead.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Highlight (Luka goes off for 39, leads Mavs to 2-0 series lead) 2021/05/25 ESHEET SOTFULL

videos.headline: Luka goes off for 39, leads Mavs to 2-0 series lead
